thread.title: Jack Whitehall, Little Mix, One Direction and Kylie Minogue are lined up for Royal Variety Performance 2016 - Showbiz
thread.title_full: Jack Whitehall, Little Mix, One Direction and Kylie Minogue are lined up for Royal Variety Performance 2016 - Showbiz News - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: Jack Whitehall, Little Mix, One Direction and Kylie Minogue are lined up for Royal Variety Performance 2016 - Showbiz
text: Jack Whitehall will welcome One Direction, Sir Elton John, Little Mix and Kylie Minogue to the stage of the Albert Hall for this year's Royal Variety Performance.Whitehall is the youngest comedian to host the annual charity gala at 27, and is set to perform alongside Britain's Got Talent winners Jules O'Dwyer and Matisse, Ricky Martin and Kacey Musgraves. © Getty Images The night of music and comedy will also include appearances from Brandon Flowers, Josh Groban, The Corrs, the cast of The West End's Mary Poppins, Beverley Knight, Jeff Lynne's ELO, the stars of Olivier winner The Play That Goes Wrong and Cirque du Soleil.Whitehall isn't the only comedian taking the stage, as Chris Ramsey, Romesh Ranganathan and Matt Forde will spoof the year's biggest news events.The royals in attendance this year will be Prince Harry and The Queen. © Rex Features / David Fisher Whitehall said of this year's show: "It's a tremendous honour to be hosting the Royal Variety Performance. Having been lucky enough to perform for Prince Charles and Prince William in previous years I look forward to the opportunity of sailing a little too close to the wind in the presence of Prince Harry this time round. "It's my third time on the show and I still am yet to perform in front of the Queen, she must be really desperate not to see my act."This star-studded bill follows one year after Bette Midler, Dame Shirley Bassey, Ellie Goulding, Collabro and Whitehall performed before The Queen.The Royal Variety Performance will take place on November 13, to air in December on ITV.
